Within technology circles, the move by Google Inc. -- born during the first dot-com boom-- to replace CEO Eric Schmidt with the 38-year-old Page left some wondering how the search giant would deal with middle age. Founder becoming CEO... Is this like a Steve Jobs returning or a Jerry Yang returning? Chris Dixon, a technology veteran who has invested in Skype and Foursquare, tweeted. Spy''/> Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer has said that the Xbox 360 is not a games console. He told USA Today that its multimedia capabilities and Kinect support makes it an entertainment device. Xbox isn't a gaming console. Xbox is a family entertainment centre. It's a place to socialise, he said. ''It's a place to watch TV. We have Hulu coming. It's the only system where you are the controller. Your voice, your gestures, your body.''
